thread.title: A happy client
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by A happy client

author: A happy client
title: A happy client
text: They helped me have a second chance in life. When I was down, they showed me the way up and helped me get there. I had nothing but good experiences with everyone in their office. They are a good team, communicate well, and are effective. Thank you to everyone there for being sincere, understanding, and supportive.
